game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the depths of the dungeon.
game.description: You have heard rumors that a powerful artifact is hidden deep within a long-abandoned dungeon. Your quest is to navigate its treacherous halls, overcome its challenges, and bring the artifact back to the surface.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and legendary status among adventurers

task.objective: Enter the Dungeon of Forgotten Secrets
task.description: Make your way to the entrance of the dungeon, which is located at the edge of the Dark Forest.
In the depths of the first level, you will encounter a skeletal guardian. Defeat it to progress.
On level 2, you will find a chamber with four statues.排列它们以打开隐藏的通道。

task.objective: Find the Key to the Final Chamber
task.description: In a hidden room on level 3, locate the key that unlocks the door to the chamber where the artifact is kept.
task.location: Dungeon of Forgotten Secrets, Level 3 Hidden Room

task.objective: Retrieve the Artifact and Escape the Dungeon
task.description: Use the key to unlock the final chamber and take possession of the artifact. Safely make your way back to the surface.
task.location: Dungeon of Forgotten Secrets, Final Chamber
